await zkml.verifyMLInference(a, b, c, input)
const input = ["0"]
const c = ["0x1d8bdc826782d612a556c134b096addcf6f18c3136a2ffdf86bb81d4a0ecf142", "0x052d8cafc343f63e1e8a0b3d336c99889c358a6e603241cdd6444e1c921b445d"]
const b = [["0x219eb867e55e0a5be66194adea12066189cfdf1224e79e52ab50ccd8b3191577", "0x04daf7f6cf4fefb0f5da4d3065ba56532163e39e24036ff6ed8b32500ca1998c"],["0x2e7f3f17de46939b4896faa03a4788040d2b6062a2759a813be06c3da357ca28", "0x0e85411df6f2eee3cbdac406aed42a149e0583c122253aaef5e4ee9eb1b34ebe"]]
const a = ["0x122398e57e16c5f76bbc492300aace34a6f235433eea58007f60a50c5ef1f819", "0x1c3eb832ca6bd9ae5112313cc806491cf3ae9187a5fd3510f091b2b402b5605f"]
const zkml = await ethers.getContractAt("ZKMLVerifier", "0xe7f1725E7734CE288F8367e1Bb143E90bb3F0512")
